comment_data.body: lan detection relies on broadcast packet being sent to port 33445, so the remote peer has to bind to that port to detect it
I think this is done. @Diadlo, you added some code to make LAN discovery work better, right? Can someone confirm?
LAN detection works. If it doesn't, please reopen and let us know.

labels.description: Bug fix for the user, not a fix to a build script
labels.name: bug

title: LAN detection does not work
